column5: Anyone have any info/experiences on this camp? It is on the Indian Chain north of Vermilion Bay.
It is connect to the Indian lk chain, but is separated by the Mcintosh Dam.
yes its on the north shore of Canyon lake just west of McIntosh lodge.
It's on Canyon lake, in Outlet bay, it's been 10 years since I last saw it and it was run down and looked deserted to me, but that was many moons ago......
